content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the ways in which scientific and philosophical developments affected religion in Europe in the period 1600 to 1750.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the ways in which scientific and philosophical developments affected religion in Europe in the period 1600 to 1750.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
